attributes.action: Upgrade of Broadband lines UK wide
attributes.additional_details:
BT and other internet network providers need to be forced to upgrade the rest of the UK network outside of the big cities and towns.  We pay the same money for AWFUL speeds of between 0.5 and 1.5M, where as cities get 20, 50M speeds.  Providers need to be forced to upgrade so everyone can get the same service before these places get any more higher speeds.

If not we should be paying by speeds we get.
